source/windows.js

return.description: Acessible disk partitions of current Windows
Acessible application folders of current Windows

content:
# FS match

A NodeJS package for finding folders, files & apps by Regular expression based on [Asynchronous iteration of ES 9](https://babeljs.io/docs/plugins/transform-async-generator-functions/).

[![NPM Dependency](https://david-dm.org/TechQuery/fs-match.svg)](https://david-dm.org/TechQuery/fs-match)

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/fs-match.png?downloads=true&downloadRank=true&stars=true)](https://nodei.co/npm/fs-match/)



## Use in another module

 - Example
   1. [find](source/find.js)
   2. [which](source/which.js)
 - Document
   - Online: [URL](https://techquery.github.io/fs-match/) or `npm docs`
   - Offline: `npm start`



## Use in Command-line shell


### Search files

```Shell
# Search in current directory

fs-match -r full\.name\.pattern

# Search in a specific folder

fs-match root/path -r full\.name\.pattern

# Search first match in a specific folder

fs-match root/path -r full\.name\.pattern -c 1
```

### Search apps

```Shell
# Show in stdout

app-find chrome firefox

# Append to a file

app-find chrome firefox -f .npmrc

# Set up NPM configuration

app-find chrome firefox -c
```


## Typical case

 1. [Puppeteer browser](https://easywebapp.github.io/puppeteer-browser)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "fs-match",
  "version": "1.3.5",
  "description": "A NodeJS package for finding folders, files & apps by Regular expression based on Asynchronous iteration of ES 9",
  "keywords": [
    "search",
    "filesystem",
    "regex-match",
    "command-line",
    "async",
    "iterator"
  ],
  "author": "shiy007@qq.com",
  "license": "LGPL-3.0",
  "homepage": "https://techquery.github.io/fs-match/",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/TechQuery/fs-match.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/TechQuery/fs-match/issues"
  },
  "main": "dist/core.js",
  "bin": {
    "fs-match": "dist/find.js",
    "app-find": "dist/which.js"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": "^5.12.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint source/ test/ --fix",
    "compile": "babel source/ -d dist/",
    "check": "mocha -r @babel/register -r @babel/polyfill -r should --no-timeouts -c --inline-diffs",
    "test": "npm run check -- --exit",
    "debug": "npm run check -- --inspect-brk",
    "build": "npm run lint  &&  npm run compile  &&  npm test",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run build",
    "precommit": "npm run build  &&  esdoc  &&  git add .",
    "start": "web-server docs/ -o"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.0.0",
    "@tech_query/node-toolkit": "^0.6.0",
    "commander": "^2.18.0",
    "fs-extra": "^7.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/core": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-async-generator-functions": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/register": "^7.0.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^9.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.6.0",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "koapache": "^1.0.4",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "should": "^13.2.3"
  },
  "babel": {
    "presets": [
      "@babel/preset-env"
    ],
    "plugins": [
      "@babel/plugin-proposal-async-generator-functions",
      "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime"
    ]
  }
}
